decisions.decision: Replace the old frontend with the new beta frontend despite it still having some issues
decisions.speaker: Bruno
decisions.context: The new frontend is already significantly better than the old one

key_facts.fact: Gluon Golden Ergo is the first implementation of the Gluon protocol and the first autonomous gold-backed stablecoin
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: Gluon on Ergo was independently audited by Krasavice Blazen and no further vulnerabilities were found
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: Five out of six stability theorems have been proven, with the last theorem almost proven
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: The formal proof of theorem five is almost 1000 lines of Coq code
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: The new frontend has no dependency on a backend anymore, making it more decentralized
key_facts.speaker: Bruno
